about_the_game:
《Sword Mistress of the Dungeon Town》is a Mystery Dungeon-type game.

STORY

The city thriving on trading treasures from its many labyrinths.

Sword Mistress, after opposing the city's powerful chambers' guild, is burdened with massive debt and forced to sign a contract that condemns her to a life of sexual slavery if she fails to repay.

Under the pressure of needing to earn a large sum of money in a short period of time, some men took advantage of the situation and made inappropriate demands...

Can Sword Mistress achieve her goal without compromising her dignity and her body ?

Character

When Sword Mistress was a child, her family was deceived by the merchant guild, leading them into overwhelming debt and eventual ruin.

Filled with hatred toward the guild, Sword Mistress vowed revenge.

Relying on her exceptional swordsmanship talent, she became a vigilante thief, making a living by attacking the guild's caravans.

Gameplay

Had to do all kinds of jobs just to pay off the debt!

◆ Bar

Sword Mistress works as a waitress...

At first it was just a bunny girl costume, but as the requirements became more and more exaggerated...

◆ Japanese Bathhouses

Sword Mistress, forced to bathe with strangers to earn money...

Although she used a special concealment spell to cover her important parts, still...

◆ Repayment Failure (BAD END)

If she can't pay back the debt,

she’ll become the trading chamber's property, losing all her rights and everything else...

System

◆ Roguelike System

Every time you enter the dungeon, the map, monsters, and dropped items are all random,

so each adventure is a completely new experience.

◆ Iteam

Various items such as arrows, potions, scrolls, weapons, and chests appear randomly in the dungeon,

each with different additional abilities.

Besides being usable directly, some items can also be thrown to produce effects.

◆ Class and Skill Tree

You can learn skills based on your preferences.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is not suitable for viewing or playing in public places.
The game contains NSFW content, including but not limited to:
sexual assault, sexual slavery, sexual violence, coercion involving nudity, alcohol-facilitated sexual assault, aphrodisiac-facilitated sexual misconduct, forced pregnancy, abortion, and other mature themes.
All characters depicted in the game are 18 years of age or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: 《Sword Mistress of the Dungeon Town》is a Mystery Dungeon-type game. Sword Mistress, in debt after defying the powerful guild, must repay or face a life of sexual slavery. As lewd demands arise, can she protect her dignity and body while reaching her goal?
